description: A list of outputs to be created from a round of voting pool outBailment consensus
title: Output list

$eref.description: A UUID which selects a specific outBailment for tracking purposes
$eref.title: outBailment Identifier

___pool.description: The voting pool identifier for the pool in which the outBailment originated

___server.description: The OT server nym for the notary which issued the transaction number

___transaction.description: The OT transaction number associated with the outBailment

___outBailmentID.description: the identifier of the originating nym's outBailment message

___address.description: the destination address for the outBailment

___amount.description: the monetary value of the outBailment, in fundamental units (satoshis for Bitcoin)
